jspecview.util
Class JDXExporter

java.lang.Object
  jspecview.util.JDXExporter

public class JDXExporter
extends java.lang.Object

class JDXExporter contains static methods for exporting a JCAMP-DX Spectrum in one of the compression formats DIF, FIX, PAC, SQZ or as x, y values.

Author:
Debbie-Ann Facey, Khari A. Bryan, Prof Robert J. Lancashire
